website_summaries.verdict: Designed for heavy lifting and durability and can be assembled in 2 hours.
pros: With a bench that holds up to 600 lb., this system earns high marks for bench pressing and squat exercises
Positive reviews for overall ease of use
cons: The bench may wobble a bit if not put together properly

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners, maybe mid tier.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, even with one person instead of two. Use a socket wrench, not an adjustable to avoid scraping the paint. The cable feels a bit cheap and doesn't slide back easily when doing lat pull-downs.
customer_reviews.author: Customer #42

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great for my home gym. It took my a while to locate the instructions, and unfortunately, the instructions are terrible. But if you can look at a picture and make an educated guess then you’ll do fine! The bench & cage is very sturdy. I have a 7ft 45 lb barbell that fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Ryan

customer_reviews.title: this is such an incredible value. My husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is such an incredible value. My husband and dad put it together in a few hours but it is top notch. So well made and so many features my dad was shocked at the price and wants one
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The only downfall would be the cheap pulley system. Other than that the machine works very well and is built very tough.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a freaking nightmare to put together. I don't how someone could put this together with 2 hours It took me a day in a half to put it together Over all it's a solid and sturdy piece of equipment. But getting it done with in a day and half is just overwhelming Had to take apart twice. I totally would recommend this to someone who has a extra pair of hands. I had to put this together by myself. But victory. Bobkat
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Instructions suck but was still easy to put together. Took about 2 hours. Thanks to hubby. Package arrived in 2 weeks. Amazon kept delaying shipping , don't know why. I love it for my home gym. Looks just like the picture. The dip bars a little far apart for me but I can make it work. So far so good. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of hardware for the dollar. The multi-functions and versatility of the cage gives you everything you need for a workout. Took a while (half day) to build with some complex steps, but it is a sturdy and stable system when complete - again, there is a lot of hardware (which is a good thing).
customer_reviews.author: William H Stone

customer_reviews.title: It’s great and came in fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this . Price was great . Easy so set up, I set it up by myself, I’ve moved it a few times by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Behlke

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Gym
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my home gym and couldn't be happier. It can do so many different workouts. Assembly was a little bit of a challenge but once completed its a great gym. Its very sturdy and easy to change up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sturdy. Just make sure you have someone to help ...
customer_reviews.text: No regrets. This thing is sturdy. Just make sure you have someone to help you assemble it! Two person job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power cage.
customer_reviews.text: This allowed me to cancel my gym membership and get a total body workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. youngwood

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great buy for the price. I would recommend this for anybody that’s to lazy to drive to a gym everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best home gym
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Been using it for 7 months now and is still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm recommending this cage highly. R.K.Krav
customer_reviews.text: Cage and bench very well built ,only I cannot get an answer about any extra safety bars for benching or squats. 8-12 inch long safety bars, comes with 4" . Other than that a real quality cage and bench.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Krav

product_meta.title: Marcy Pro Full Cage and Weight Bench Personal Home Gym Total Body Workout System
product_meta.description: Perfect for your basement, garage, or workout area in your dwelling, this Marcy Pro Full Cage and Bench System is jam packed with exercises that help you maintain a toned and fit physique. This cage and bench system not only makes your workout area look sleek and sophisticated, but it makes your body look the same. With heavy duty steel construction, it's sturdy and durable for many years of home workouts. It has a maximum user weight of 300 pounds and a maximum weight of 600 pounds on the bench. The bar and weights are not included, but can be easily incorporated with this system. Save time and money by weight training in the comfort and convenience of your own home with this Marcy Pro Full Cage System.
feature_bullets: This all-in-one gym equipment features a variety of fitness exercises to tone and strengthens the core, thighs, arms, and legs. It’s a combination of a Smith machine, pull-up bar, dip station, high-low pulley station, and a leg developer.
This multi-functional machine will help you target the different body parts. For the chest and shoulders area, you may do some crossover workouts through the pulley system, pull-up bars, and dips.

Power-up your upper body muscles and strengthen the lower body muscles with the leg developer. For thighs and legs training, the bottom pulley and leg developer allow you to target the hams, quads, and glutes.

The workout bench has a padded seat that is adjustable to multiple different positions. The press bar also has adjustable safety stops and bar catches. With the Olympic barbell training station with multiple height adjustments

Made of 14-gauge square steel tubing the durable assembled cage dimension is 61 x 71.75 x 86.75 inches and the assembled bench dimension is 48 x 30.5 x 45.5 inches – ideal to place at your home gym. It also set with storage posts, making it easy for you to organize your weight plates.
